name: PHVS_DischargeDisposition_HL7_2x
title: Discharge Disposition (HL7)
description: The disposition of the patient at time of discharge (i.e., discharged to home, expired, etc.). Uses User-defined Table 0112 - Discharge Disposition; this field is used on UB92 FL22.
